page_content: The page provides downloadable documents needed for conducting CODE-Werkstatt, an educational program focused on coding and robotics.
The page offers a toolkit for schools to establish rules for computer and internet usage, with downloadable guides and illustrations.
The page provides information on IT support services for schools, including contact details and service hours.
The page discusses the importance of employee performance reviews (MAG) and provides guidelines and forms for conducting these reviews.
The page describes an IT support training program aimed at different age groups, covering areas like Windows support, hardware maintenance, and data migration.
The page outlines the conditions for accessing the arbo database, which is managed by the software Geres, and describes the types of data queries that can be made.
The page provides a comprehensive FAQ section about E-Tax BL, a web-based application for electronic tax filing in the Canton of Basel-Landschaft.
